name: Língua
summary: Follow Beto's adventure through the northeast of Brazil in this top-down adventure! Solve puzzles, battle to free animal spirits and finish quests to help a friend retrieve a valuable possession!

name: Língjiè Yì Wén Lù
summary: "Língjiè Yì Wén Lù" is a Japanese-style story background, combined with a fresh and beautiful art style, and supplemented by a variety of special systems, showing players a wonderful Japanese magical two-dimensional world.
